# 1. libraries
```{r libraries, results=F}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(Seurat)
  library(org.Dr.eg.db)
  library(BSgenome.Drerio.UCSC.danRer11)
  library(Signac)
  library(dplyr)
  library(ggplot2)
  library(ggsci)
  library(patchwork)
})
options(future.globals.maxSize = 4000 * 1024^2)
```
```{r mypal}
mypal <- pal_igv(palette = "default",alpha = 1)(30)
```

# 2. Read data
```{r readData}
seurat <- readRDS(file = "RDSfiles/HB10hpf.clustered.RDS")
DefaultAssay(seurat) <- "SCT"
Idents(seurat) <- "wsnn_res.3"
DimPlot(seurat, reduction = "wnn.umap", label = T, repel = T) + scale_color_igv()
```

# 3. Rename Idents
```{r RenameIdents, fig.height=5, fig.width=10}
Idents(seurat) <- "wsnn_res.3"
seurat <- RenameIdents(seurat,
                       "0" = "Placode.1",
                       "1" = "HB.1",
                       "2" = "MHB",
                       "3" = "FB & eye.1",
                       "4" = "Vasc & heart",
                       "5" = "Somite.1",
                       "6" = "MB",
                       "7" = "Placode.2",
                       "8" = "Placode.3",
                       "9" = "NC",
                       "10" = "CHB",
                       "11" = "HB.2",
                       "12" = "Somite.2",
                       "13" = "SC",
                       "14" = "Muscle",
                       "15" = "FB & eye.2",
                       "16" = "Placode.4",
                       "17" = "HB & NC",
                       "18" = "FB",
                       "19" = "Somite.3",
                       "20" = "Vasc & skeletal",
                       "21" = "Notochord",
                       "22" = "Ciliated",
                       "23" = "Endoderm",
                       "24" = "HG")
seurat$Clusters <- Idents(seurat)
umapPlot <- DimPlot(seurat, group.by = "Clusters", reduction = "wnn.umap") + scale_color_igv()
umapPlot
#ggsave(filename = "../results/FigureS1_HB10hpf_umapPlot.png", plot = umapPlot)
```

```{r save}
saveRDS(seurat, file = "RDSfiles/HB10hpf.clustered.RDS")
```

# 4. Find DE genes
```{r markers, results=F}
All.markers <- FindAllMarkers(seurat, only.pos = T, verbose = F)
write.table(All.markers, file = "../results/FigureS1_HB10hpf_markers.txt", sep = "\t", quote = F, col.names = NA)
```

```{r top5}
top5.pval <- All.markers %>% group_by(cluster) %>% top_n(n=-5, wt = p_val) %>% top_n(n=5, wt = avg_log2FC)
top5.pval
```

# 5. Plots
## 5.1 dotplot
```{r dotplot, fig.width=25, fig.height=5}
dotPlot <- DotPlot(seurat, features = unique(top5.pval$gene)) + RotatedAxis()
dotPlot
#ggsave(filename = "../results/FigureS1_HB10hpf_dotPlot.png", plot = dotPlot)
```

## 5.2 heatmap
```{r heatmap, fig.height=20, fig.width=10}
heatmapPlot <- DoHeatmap(seurat, features = unique(top5.pval$gene), group.colors = mypal, size = 5, angle = 90) + guides(color = FALSE)
heatmapPlot
#ggsave(filename = "../results/FigureS1_HB10hpf_heatmapPlot.png", plot = heatmapPlot)
```

## 5.3 combine umap, dotplot and heatmap
```{r combined, fig.height=14, fig.width=23}
combined <- (((umapPlot + 
      theme(legend.text = element_text(size = 20))) |
     (heatmapPlot +
        theme(axis.text = element_blank()))) / 
    (dotPlot + 
       theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 10),
             axis.text.y = element_text(size = 12),
             legend.position = "bottom"))) +
    plot_layout(heights = c(2.2,1))
combined
ggsave(filename = "../results/FigureS1_HB10hpf_combinedPlot.png", plot = combined)
```
